new desktop: real documentation

20 Mar 2007 Now that I've figured out how to use EncFS with libpam-encfs under Ubuntu, I decided to share this knowledge with the world. I've been working on a "Useful Content" page that provides details instructions on how to setup EncFS with libpam-encfs on Ubuntu 6.10 (Edgy)

It's still under development, because I want to be very thourough. I installed Ubuntu desktop in VMWare Workstation and create snapshots as I move along. Every step I take is documented (that's the way I like to document things). Wrong steps are erased by reverting to the previous snapshot.

Now that I think of it, I might provide a VMWare image with Ubuntu installed and EncFS+libpam-encfs setup correctly, for usage in the free VMWare Player
